name: 1080p
description:
The monitor is on the verge of failure! The image is jittery and blown out, it's all due to bugs. Only a special pixel can bring the quality back to the former 1080p.

1080p is a casual shooter with rogue-lite elements. Join new pixels, combine guns and find improvements.

Move within the arena and shoot enemies!

Combine cannons! Assemble your build!

Destroying powerful bosses!
